Use candles: Candles are a traditional and effective way to create ambiance in a room. They can be placed on tables or shelves, or used to line the perimeter of the room. The flickering flame creates a warm and cozy atmosphere, and the scent of burning wax adds an extra layer of comfort.

Use natural light: If the room has windows, consider opening them up to let in as much natural light as possible. Natural light is often warmer and more inviting than artificial light, and it can also help to reduce energy consumption.

Use string lights: String lights are a fun and creative way to add some sparkle to a room. They can be hung from the ceiling or draped across walls or furniture. They come in a variety of colors and styles, so you can choose the ones that best suit your decor.

Use booklights: Booklights are small, portable lights that are perfect for reading in bed or on the couch. They can be easily tucked into books or carried around the room, and they don't require any electricity.

Use oil lamps: Oil lamps are a classic and elegant way to light up a room. They use a wick to burn oil, which produces a warm and soft glow. Oil lamps can be found in a variety of sizes and styles, so you can choose the one that best suits your decor.
